Message showed after:
 - create server instance of Apache Tomcat 5.5. While creating - add project to 
list of published projects.
 - open server properties, go to Modules, open module, remove checkbox "Auto 
reloading enabled" and change path from "/arp.site" to "/"
 - start debug server

This should be resolved in WTP 1.5 RC2.  Please reopen with new stack traces if you reproduce again.
